ygData.subject: weapons upgrade?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a level 14 Tier dal warrior named Stilette on Innoruuk. Her current weapon setup is: Right hand Dragoon Dirk (Lore, magic) Left hand Tentacle Whip
ygData.messageBody:
I have a level 14 Tier'dal warrior named Stilette on Innoruuk.

Her current weapon setup is:
Right hand Dragoon Dirk (Lore, magic)
Left hand Tentacle Whip (magic)

I would like to upgrade the tentacle whip to something else. If you know
the stats on it, they suck, and I could care less about the lifetap effect.
The replacement weapon must do magic damage. What is a decent piercing or
1h slashing weapon for 200plat or less. I would be willing to switch to a
1h blunt weapon but would prefer not to. Due to my race I will most likely
be purchasing in the commonlands, Oasis, or Ro. I will not be traveling to
any of the other continents.

How much do blackened boots go for BTW?

Kindrael
